content.1: After this I looked, and, behold, a door
content.2: And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, and
content.3: And he that sat was to look upon like a jasper and a sardine stone: and
content.5: And out of the throne proceeded lightnings and thunderings and voices: and
content.8: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about
content.9: And when those beasts give glory and honour and thanks to him that sat on the throne, who liveth for ever and ever,
content.10: The four and twenty elders fall down before him that sat on the throne, and worship him that liveth for ever and ever, and cast their crowns before the throne, saying,
content.11: Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.
